question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Send an email to the admin email ID: itsupport@relam.com.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: You can return any product within 30 days of delivery. Call the sales team on number +919876543210.

question: How can I track my order?
answer: After your order ships, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use that to track your order on our website.

question: What's your Name?
answer: I am Smart Faq Chatbot that provides you information about our services.

question: Create some Gibhli image
answer: You can use Azure OpenAI or other AI tools to create a Ghibli-style image.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can email us at support@example.com or call us at (123) 456-7890 from 9am to 5pm, Monday through Friday.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, UPI, and PayPal.

question: Can I change or cancel my order?
answer: Orders can be changed or canceled within 1 hour of placing them. Please contact support immediately for assistance.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Standard shipping usually takes 3–5 business days. Expedited shipping is available at checkout.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping fees and delivery times vary by location.

question: What should I do if I receive a damaged product?
answer: Please take a photo of the damaged item and contact support within 48 hours of delivery. We’ll arrange a replacement or refund.

question: Is my personal information safe?
answer: Yes, we use SSL encryption and follow industry best practices to keep your data secure.

question: How do I update my account information?
answer: Log in to your account, go to 'Account Settings,' and update your personal information as needed.

question: How can I delete my account?
answer: Please contact support@example.com with your request, and we will assist you in deleting your account.

question: What should I do if I forgot my username?
answer: Click on 'Forgot Username' on the login screen and follow the instructions to recover your username.

question: How do I reset my password if I don't have access to my email?
answer: Please contact support@example.com for assistance in resetting your password.

question: Can I use multiple discount codes on a single order?
answer: Only one discount code can be applied per order.

question: Do you offer gift cards?
answer: Yes, we offer digital gift cards in various denominations. You can purchase them on our website.

question: How do I redeem a gift card?
answer: Enter the gift card code at checkout in the 'Gift Card' field.

question: Can I use a gift card for subscription services?
answer: Gift cards can be used for one-time purchases but not for recurring subscription payments.

question: How do I subscribe to your newsletter?
answer: Scroll to the bottom of our homepage and enter your email address in the 'Subscribe' field.

question: How can I unsubscribe from your newsletter?
answer: Click the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any newsletter email you receive.

question: Do you offer student discounts?
answer: We offer occasional promotions and discounts. Please check our website or subscribe to our newsletter for updates.

question: How do I apply a discount code?
answer: Enter the discount code at checkout in the 'Promo Code' field.

question: Can I change the shipping address after placing an order?
answer: Orders can be updated within 1 hour of placing them. Please contact support immediately for assistance.

question: How do I know if my order has been shipped?
answer: You will receive a shipping confirmation email with tracking information once your order has shipped.

question: Can I pick up my order in-store?
answer: Currently, we do not offer in-store pickup. All orders are shipped directly to your address.

question: Do you offer same-day delivery?
answer: Same-day delivery is available in select areas. Please check at checkout to see if it's available for your location.

question: How can I check the status of my refund?
answer: Refunds are processed within 5–7 business days. You will receive a confirmation email once your refund has been issued.

question: What should I do if I haven't received my refund?
answer: Please check your bank or payment provider's processing times. If you still haven't received it, contact support@example.com.

question: Can I return a digital product?
answer: Digital products are non-refundable unless they are defective or not as described.

question: How do I report a bug or technical issue?
answer: Please contact support@example.com with details about the issue, and our team will assist you.

question: How do I update my billing information?
answer: Log in to your account, go to 'Billing Information,' and update your payment details as needed.

question: How can I upgrade my subscription plan?
answer: Log in to your account, go to 'Subscription Settings,' and select the plan you'd like to upgrade to.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: Log in to your account, go to 'Subscription Settings,' and follow the instructions to cancel your subscription.

question: Can I pause my subscription?
answer: Currently, we do not offer a pause feature. You can cancel your subscription and resubscribe at any time.

question: How do I redeem a promotional offer?
answer: Enter the promotional code at checkout in the 'Promo Code' field.

question: Do you offer price matching?
answer: We do not offer price matching at this time.

question: How do I leave a product review?
answer: After purchasing a product, you will receive an email invitation to leave a review. Alternatively, you can visit the product page on our website.

question: How can I contact you about a media inquiry?
answer: Please email media@example.com for all media-related inquiries.

question: How do I apply for a job with your company?
answer: Visit our Careers page on our website to view current job openings and submit your application.

question: How can I become a reseller or affiliate?
answer: Please email partnerships@example.com for information on our reseller and affiliate programs.

question: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
answer: Wholesale pricing is available for bulk orders. Please contact sales@example.com for more information.

question: How do I track my referral rewards?
answer: Log in to your account and go to 'Referral Program' to view your rewards and referral status.

question: How do I report a fraudulent transaction?
answer: Please contact support@example.com immediately with details of the transaction, and we will investigate the issue.

question: How do I update my communication preferences?
answer: Log in to your account, go to 'Communication Preferences,' and adjust your settings as needed.

question: How can I provide feedback about your products or services?
answer: We welcome your feedback! Please email feedback@example.com with your comments or suggestions.

question: How do I request a product demo?
answer: Please contact sales@example.com to schedule a product demonstration.

question: How do I access your API?
answer: Call manager to get access.

question: How do I report a security vulnerability?
answer: Please email security@example.com with details of the vulnerability, and our team will address it promptly.
